title: Premiere: SEYD – Secrets
content:
Birmingham teenager SEYD impressed on her debut offering; the punchy, CHVRCHES-esque This Ain’t Easy, and has now followed it up with the equally as alluring Secrets.

Again recalling elements of Lauren Mayberry’s pitch perfect vocal, Secrets is another glittering, chorus orientated number, showcasing the colossal potential that eighteen year old SEYD carries into 2017.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
